text: Attended 2 days course of basic fresh flowers arrangement using the skillfuture. The coach, Xiang Yi is very patient and helpful. She made the class less tense with her friendly approach. She is more like a friend than a coach. Lessons were well planned and easy to comprehend. I truly enjoyed my 2 days lesson. Highly recommended.

Had the most wonderful 2 days with Xiang Yi and coursemates! Found the course most useful, relevant, interesting, enjoyable and helpful. Was v engaged from beginning to end. I will definitely be looking to sign up for the 2&1/2 WS course. Looking foward and mostly just wanted to thank u for a course well executed and thoughtfully planned.. the book that is given to us helps a lot too with descriptions of flowers and foliage etc.
well done Joan and Xiang Yi ❤️

was trying to find a florist in town to get a celebratory bouquet for my girlfriend’s promotion. fleuriste had an gorgeous selection at very reasonable prices (about 10% cheaper than what i usually get them for). super responsive when i texted them, and i was able to pick up my order through a flexible arrangement after store opening hours. thanks again fleurist, you’ve got yourself a regular :)

Attended Joan's both basic & WSQ floral arrangement workshop. Joan is such a passionate, down-to-earth, friendly, kind, honest, sincere lady. She's always that generous towards the flowers, accessories, vases that she is willing to open to her students during the workshops. Reliable trustworthy lady & business. Thank you Joan & team.

Would definitely recommend Fleuriste, I had a hand bouquet on my wedding day. Thank you so much for the beautifully arranged bouquet and to accommodate to my last minute request. The flowers were fresh and in the right colours that I hoped for!
